page.title: 09HOW I SPEND SATURDAY
page.content: I get up at 7.00a.m. and go downstairs, switch on the television and make myself a cup of tea. I watch the T.V. until about 9.30. By this time my parents are awake, so I go upstairs to have a shower and get dressed. Then I have some breakfast and a cup of tea. On most Saturdays I go to the City. I take some money and a door key, take my bicycle from the shed and ride along Newmarket Road to the City. I chain my bicycle to the subway railings and go to several shops before collecting my bicycle and riding home. I have a snack lunch and then I look after my sister. At about 7.00p.m. we have a cooked meal, and then I watch the television until my bedtime at 9.00.
